Edwards Financial Customer Service Human Resources and Purchasing systems working closely with internal teams to help provide both stability and improvements to current systems and help design future enhancements Serve as the primary business relationship lead between IT and internal groups This also includes being the technical liaison within the Information Technology Department for requirements
